product_name: Pearl Izumi Ultrastar Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Loaded with great details, the Pearl Izumi Ultrastar Bike Jersey for women keeps up with you on the go. Polyester/elastane blend offers compression, moisture transfer and UPF 50+ sun protection. 10" zipper with zipper garage lets you vent when things heat up. 3 back pockets. The Pearl Izumi Ultrastar Bike Jersey for women features reflective elements for low-light visibility.
short_description: Loaded with great details, the Pearl Izumi Ultrastar Bike Jersey for women keeps up with you on the go.
